directions: Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini; sauté until slices are light golden and tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and red pepper; stir 1 minute. Season to taste with sea salt. Transfer zucchini to serving platter, sprinkle with parsley, and serve.
ingredients: 2 pounds zucchini, halved crosswise, each half cut lengthwise into 4 flat slices
title: Zucchini with Garlic and Dried Crushed Red Pepper
